pandas.replace_code:
def pivot_table(
    data,
    values=None,
    index=None,
    columns=None,
    aggfunc="mean",
    fill_value=None,
    margins=False,
    dropna=True,
    margins_name="All",
    observed=False,
) -> "DataFrame":
    from pandas.core.reshape.pivot import pivot_table
    def _convert_by(by):
        if by is None:
            return []
        if isinstance(by, str):
            by = [by]
        return list(by)
    
    index = _convert_by(index)
    columns = _convert_by(columns)
    
    if not _is_index_like(index):
        raise ValueError("index must be the name of the column when data is a DataFrame")
    if not _is_index_like(columns):
        raise ValueError("columns must be the name of the column when data is a DataFrame")
    
    if isinstance(aggfunc, list):
        pieces = []
        keys = []
        for func in aggfunc:
            table = pivot_table(
                data,
                values=values,
                index=index,
                columns=columns,
                fill_value=fill_value,
                aggfunc=func,
                margins=margins,
                dropna=dropna,
                margins_name=margins_name,
                observed=observed,
            )
            pieces.append(table)
            keys.append(getattr(func, "__name__", func))
    
        return concat(pieces, keys=keys, axis=1)
    
    # GH14938 Make sure value exists in data
    if values is not None:
        if is_list_like(values):
            values_multi = True
        else:
            values = [values]
            values_multi = False
    
        missing = [v for v in values if v not in data]
        if missing:
            raise ValueError("The columns in `values` are not the same as the columns in `data`.")
    
        for key in (index + columns):
            if isinstance(key, Grouper) and not key.key in data:
                raise KeyError(key)
    
    from pandas.core.reshape.pivot import pivot_table
    table = pivot_table(
        data,
        values=values,
        index=index,
        columns=columns,
        aggfunc=aggfunc,
        fill_value=fill_value,
        margins=margins,
        dropna=dropna,
        margins_name=margins_name,
        observed=observed,
    )
    return table
